mapper.insert: insert into register (nid, userID, phoneNumber, password, username) values (#{nid}, #{userID}, #{phoneNumber}, #{password}, #{username})
mapper.select: select password from register where nid = #{nid}
select userID, phoneNumber, username from register where nid = #{nid}
mapper.insert: insert into key_info (addrGenIP, ideakey, timehash) values (#{addrGenIP}, #{ideaKey}, #{timeHash})
mapper.select: select ideakey from key_info where addrGenIP = #{addrGenIP} and timehash = #{timeHash}
select prefix from aidnth_info where aidnth = #{aidnth}
select AIDnTH from timehash where AID = #{AID}
mapper.insert: insert into aid_trunc_info (address, visibleAID, hiddenAID, timeDifference) values (#{address}, #{visibleAID}, #{hiddenAID}, #{timeDifference})
mapper.select: select hiddenAID from aid_trunc_info where visibleAID = #{visibleAID} and timeDifference = #{timeDifference}
select timeDifference from aid_trunc_info where address = #{address}
